scripts.unlink: npm unlink hibb-faceted-search hibb-pagination hi-svg-icons && npm i
scripts.prebuild: npm run unlink && rm -rf build/production && mkdir -p build/production/css && mkdir build/production/js
scripts.build: npm run build:coffee && npm run build:jade && npm run build:css
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:main && npm run build:css:libs
scripts.build:coffee: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/index.coffee --transform coffeeify --extension=".coffee" --transform jadeify --extension=".jade" --require ./node_modules/backbone/backbone:backbone --require ./node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery:jquery --require ./node_modules/underscore/underscore:underscore | uglifyjs --screw-ie8 --verbose --stats > build/production/js/main.js
